explains: v. 到期，失效；死亡；呼气，吐气；（任期）届满

sentences.en: When does your driving licence expire?
sentences.cn: 你的驾照什么时候到期？

sentences.en: He is planning another tour abroad, yet his passport will expire at the end of this month.
sentences.cn: 他计划再次出国旅行，但他的护照将于本月底到期。

sentences.en: 5bn program of grants to fund new affordable housing, set to expire in 2015, is unlikely to be extended beyond then.
sentences.cn: 为新的经济适用房提供资金的50亿英镑资助计划将于2015年到期，到时不可能得到延长。
